1818년판 문장: You may easily conceive that I was much gratified by the offered communication; yet I could not endure that he should renew his grief by a recital of his misfortunes.

1818년판 문장: The infant Elizabeth, the only child of his deceased sister, was cared for in his home.
1831년판 문장: They were fond of the sweet orphan.
